solution_line_template: The chips were divided into {ian_ratio_part} + {lyle_ratio_part} = <<{ian_ratio_part}+{lyle_ratio_part}={total_ratio_parts}>>{total_ratio_parts} parts.
Since Lyle owns {lyle_ratio_part} parts, then he has {lyle_ratio_part} x {chips_per_part} = <<{lyle_ratio_part}*{chips_per_part}={lyle_chips}>>{lyle_chips} chips.
This is {lyle_chips}/{total_chips} x {percentage_multiplier} = <<{lyle_chips}/{total_chips}*{percentage_multiplier}={lyle_percentage}>>{lyle_percentage}% of the entire chips.
